      • addFaculty

        public boolean addFaculty(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String rePassword,
                          int maxCourses)
        adds a faculty member to the directory
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the faculty member
        lastName - the last name of the faculty member
        id - the id of the faculty member
        email - the email of the faculty member
        password - the password of the faculty member
        rePassword - the repeated password of the faculty member
        maxCourses - the number of courses taught by the faculty member
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not a faculty member can be added to the directory

      • removeFaculty

        public boolean removeFaculty(java.lang.String facultyId)
        removes a faculty member from the directory
        Parameters:
        facultyId - the faculty member's id
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not a faculty member can be removed

      • getFacultyDirectory

        Returns:
        String[][] the 2D array containing firstname, lastName and id
